comments.message: BUG: setLogLevel method is empty - does not actually set the log level
comments.current_code:
public static func setLogLevel(_ level: LogLevel) {
}

suggestions: Fix the setLogLevel method to actually set the log level
Note: The Logger type is named GitBrainLogger, not Logger. Previous reviews suggesting Logger.log() should use GitBrainLogger.log() instead
Positive: Good use of os.log for efficient logging, proper log level filtering, and clean API design

review_summary.positive_notes: Good use of os.log for efficient logging, proper log level filtering, and clean API design. The setLogLevel bug should be fixed.
